analysis.key_quote: Making civil servants political appointees WILL NOT make the government more efficient in any way, which I think most people understand and appreciate.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the idea of making civil servants political appointees, emphasizing the importance of institutional knowledge and the negative impact of politicization on government efficiency. It also highlights a commitment to nonpartisan service, which aligns with concerns about the politicization of civil service.
